net.wenheqi.util.encoding

Class Base62.Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.wenheqi.util.encoding.Base62.Encoder
  • Enclosing class:
    Base62

    public static class Base62.Encoder
extends Object
    This class implements an encoder for encoding data using the Base62 encoding scheme. Instances of Base62.Encoder class are save for use by multiple concurrent threads. Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a method of this class will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.
    See Also:
    Base62.Decoder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] encode(byte[] data)
      Encodes all bytes from the specified byte array into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base62 encoding scheme.
      byte[] encode(int number)
      Converts the specified integer to a byte array and encodes all bytes from the specified number into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base62 encoding scheme.
      byte[] encode(long number)
      Converts the specified long to a byte array and encodes all bytes from the specified number into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base62 encoding scheme.
      byte[] encode(String str)
      Encodes this string into a sequence of bytes using StandardCharsets.UTF_8 and Encodes this byte array into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base62 encoding scheme.
      byte[] encode(String str, Charset charset)
      Encodes this string into a sequence of bytes using the given charset and Encodes this byte array into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base62 encoding scheme.
      Base62.Encoder withAlphabet(char[] alphabet)
      Returns an encoder instance that encodes equivalently to this one, but with a specified encoding alphabet.
      Base62.Encoder withPadToWidth(int padToWidth)
      Returns an encoder instance that encodes equivalently to this one, but with a specified padToWidth value.

        public byte[] encode(byte[] data)
        Encodes all bytes from the specified byte array into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base62 encoding scheme.
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to encode
        Returns:
        A newly-allocated byte array containing the resulting encoded bytes.

        Returns:
        A newly-allocated byte array containing the resulting encoded bytes.

        public byte[] encode(String str,

        Parameters:

      • withAlphabet

        public Base62.Encoder withAlphabet(char[] alphabet)
        Returns an encoder instance that encodes equivalently to this one, but with a specified encoding alphabet. The padToWidth is unaffected by this invocation.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - The alphabet to be used to encode the data
        Returns:
        an equivalent encoder that encodes with specified alphabet

      • withPadToWidth

        public Base62.Encoder withPadToWidth(int padToWidth)
        Returns an encoder instance that encodes equivalently to this one, but with a specified padToWidth value. The default encoder has padToWidth set to 0, i.e. no padding will be added to the encoded result. If specified and the result byte array has a smaller length than padToWidth, the result will be padded from the beginning of the array with the character corresponding to index 0 to meet the width requirement. The alphabet is unaffected by this invocation.
        Parameters:
        padToWidth - The min length of result byte array after encoding
        Returns:
        an equivalent encoder that encodes with specified padToWidth
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if padToWidth < 0
